possibleError.headline: Possible Errors
possibleError.description: The following rules detect patterns that can lead to errors.

bestPractice.headline: Best Practices
bestPractice.description: These are rules designed to prevent you from making mistakes. They either prescribe a better way of doing something or help you avoid footguns..

deprecatedAngularFeature.headline: Deprecated Angular Features
deprecatedAngularFeature.description: These rules prevent you from using deprecated angular features.

naming.headline: Naming
naming.description: These rules help you to specify several naming conventions.

conventions.headline: Conventions
conventions.description: Angular often provide multi ways to to something. These rules help you to define convention for your project.

angularWrapper.headline: Angular Wrappers
angularWrapper.description: These rules help you to enforce the usage of angular wrappers.

misspelling.headline: Misspelling
misspelling.description: These rules help you avoiding misspellings.

deprecatedRule.headline: Deprecated rules
deprecatedRule.description: These rules will be removed in version 1.0.0

removedRule.headline: Removed
removedRule.description: These rules were removed and only exist to inform users about their removal.

uncategorizedRule.headline: Uncategorized rule (only for development)
uncategorizedRule.description: Add a @category tag to your rule.
